subject: p13964474
History: Evaluation of the patient with esophagopleural fistula and right necrotizing pneumonia.
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to. The ET tube, the esophageal stent are unchanged. The right internal jugular line has been discontinued. There is no definitive evidence of pneumoperitoneum. Right mid lower lung opacification is unchanged as well as left mid lower lobe opacities. No appreciable pneumothorax is seen.
